title: Linux vs Windows

itemA.name: Linux
cons: Some software not available (Adobe, MS Office)
itemA.bestFor: Developers, privacy-conscious users, servers, and those tired of Windows limitations

itemB.name: Windows
cons: Bloatware and ads in the OS
itemB.bestFor: Users who need specific Windows-only software or maximum game compatibility

verdict: Linux is ideal for developers, privacy-focused users, and anyone tired of Windows' limitations. Windows remains necessary for specific professional software and competitive gaming. Many users dual-boot or use Linux as their primary OS with Windows in a VM for specific needs.

seo.title: Linux vs Windows: Complete Comparison Guide
seo.description: Should you switch from Windows to Linux? Compare cost, privacy, performance, gaming, and software compatibility. Make an informed decision.
